metadata.title: CVE-2019-5883 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS 16.04 LTS (xenial) - low
metadata.description: An Incorrect Access Control issue was discovered in GitLab Community andEnterprise Edition 6.0 and later but before 11.3.11, 11.4.x before 11.4.8,and 11.5.x before 11.5.1. The issue comments feature could allow a user tocomment on an issue which they shouldn't be allowed to.

criterions.comment: gitlab: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'not maintainable').
